report.title: My surveys
report.query: select #columns# from cache_samples_functional s join cache_samples_nonfunctional snf on snf.id=s.id left join cache_samples_functional sc on sc.parent_sample_id=s.id where s.website_id in (#website_ids#) and s.parent_sample_id is null and s.created_by_id=#user_id#

param.name: user_id
param.description: ID of the user to show surveys for

column.name: draft
column.sql: case s.record_status when 'I' then 'Draft' else null end
